title: AmharicBERT: Transformer-based Language Model for Amharic
venue: Proceedings of the AfricaNLP Workshop, ICLR 2023
abstract: AmharicBERT is the first large-scale pretrained language model for Amharic, achieving state-of-the-art results on text classification, named entity recognition, and question answering. It leverages the power of transformers for low-resource NLP applications.

title: Machine Translation for Ethiopian Languages: Challenges and Opportunities
abstract: This survey highlights challenges in machine translation for Ethiopian languages, including data scarcity and linguistic diversity, while proposing strategies for scalable low-resource NLP systems.
